instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Manrope' for all headings to give a friendly, modern feel.
Use 'Inter' for all data tables and dense information.
Primary color is #46A758 (Bamboo Green). Use it for primary actions and active states.
Backgrounds should be mostly #F8FAFC (Slate-50) to keep it airy.
Cards must have a subtle border (border-slate-200) and shadow-sm.
Do not use heavy gradients. Stick to flat colors or very subtle gradients for active states.
For the 'India-First' payroll, ensure currency formatting is â‚¹ (INR) and date format is DD/MM/YYYY.
Use the 'Bento' grid layout for the dashboard overview.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
Use Shadcn UI components but override the default radius to 'rounded-lg' or 'rounded-xl' to match the softer aesthetic.
For the sidebar, use a white background with a subtle right border. Active links should have a light green background (bg-green-50) and green text.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for headers and modals only.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...)
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...})
